capabilities.name: fetchEmails
capabilities.description: Fetch emails from Gmail inbox with optional search query and filters

capabilities.name: get_latest_emails
capabilities.description: Get the most recent emails from Gmail, optionally including read emails

capabilities.name: get_emails_from_user
capabilities.description: Get emails from a specific sender email address

capabilities.name: get_unread_emails
capabilities.description: Get all unread emails, optionally filtered by date

capabilities.name: get_emails_by_thread
capabilities.description: Get all emails in a specific Gmail thread

capabilities.name: get_starred_emails
capabilities.description: Get all starred emails, optionally filtered by date

capabilities.name: get_emails_by_context
capabilities.description: Search emails by context or keywords in subject, body, or both

capabilities.name: get_emails_by_date
capabilities.description: Get emails within a specific date range

capabilities.name: send_email
capabilities.description: Send an email through Gmail with support for CC, BCC, and HTML content

capabilities.name: send_email_reply
capabilities.description: Reply to an existing email message

capabilities.name: search_email
capabilities.description: Advanced Gmail search using Gmail search operators. Supports complex queries like "from:example@gmail.com has:attachment after:2023/01/01"

capabilities.name: create_draft_email
capabilities.description: Create a draft email that can be reviewed and sent later
